prompt: A lo-fi hip hop beat with a mellow electric piano playing smooth jazzy chords over a laid-back boom-bap drum pattern. A deep sub bass hums beneath the groove. Heavy vinyl crackle and tape wow-and-flutter saturate the mix, with the high frequencies rolled off and muffled, giving it a dusty vintage character. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Timbre: add vinyl crackle + tape wobble + muffled highs
